title: Geth crashing with syncmode fast - consistently - new install
body:
Hi there,

please note that this is an issue tracker reserved for bug reports and feature requests.

For general questions please use the gitter channel or the Ethereum stack exchange at https://ethereum.stackexchange.com.

#### System information

Geth version: `geth version`   Geth 1.81-stable-1e6
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Commit hash : (if `develop`)

#### Expected behaviour
Geth would not crash

#### Actual behaviour
Geth crashes consistently within 10 minutes of syncing with --fast 

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Be on a new VPS...

geth --syncmode fast --rpc --rpcaddr "localhost" --rpcport 8545 --datadir "/mnt/volume-nyc1-01/geth"


Wham.. error

#### Backtrace

````
